name: Sweet Candy 2018: Mania Pop
description:
Sweet Candy 2018: Mania Pop is a new type of match 3 and collect 3 or more for deluxe candies in sweet candy.
Player could choose sweet boosters to got a highest score at each level of sweet candy.

Features:
- Addictive match three causal puzzle
- Interesting match three candy adventure
- Over 400 levels of candy matching puzzle
- Switch and match three in a row to remove them
- Match 5 to create a candy explosion
- Endless fun for both kids and adults
